top_comments.comment: Lucario: "Not yet, Ash! I can do this!"
I really have a question can ash use mega lucario and ash greyninja form at the same time cause ash greyninja need an mega stone.... 🤔🤔🤔
I say 8.5 because lucario got beat up like a rag doll, would be nice to show ash having better strategies. It gets a boost just because of Leon is so cool I bet the next episode will be a 10!

comments_since_last_sample.body: This was a good episode I liked that it begins with Ash and Goh Arriving at Bea’s Gym were She is training and it was nice that we got to see her Fully Team possibly and it was nice that Ash brought his Full team with him as they don’t get out much while Bea says to Ash they will have their battle tomorrow as she was in the middle of Training and Korrina appears and it is revealed she and Bea are friends which is good and she brought Chocolates which she must use of Bea’s sweet tooth and so they all eat and it was nice that we got Ash and Bea Interacting before their battle then the next day they battle I liked that they were switching their Pokemon like in the Volkner battle and I liked that Lucario refused to Mega Evolve as it was not and i liked that Leon appears to join the commentary of the battle and act to Ash and Bea’s rivalry and I liked that the episode ends with Lucario and Machamp about to Clash.
